The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, they do not realize that what was going on with them is something more sinister and difficult to deal with: Lovecraftian monsters. Unfortunately, as big fans ourselves of Lovecraft we found this movie too silly for our hard-core tastes.

Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie was decent produced though.
That being said, as a piece of film from 1950 it's still quite beautiful,, especially because of Love Quotes. If one is new to Walt Disney's forebears I would recommend looking that up with regards to this movie and see how Walt developed his style further after

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is clearly an example of love it or hate it movie has I believe either you will Love it for what it and love Joe's one liners or you will hate the entirety of it with a strong passion but beside a couple issues I personally enjoy this film quite love actually quite of bit.
